items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.9 Released
content: Brought back from the dead! However this update also brings:
• Updated to work with game version: v.0.14.0.0.
• Removed custom ouija board message due to it being impossible

items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.8 Released
content: Added hotkey support for the menu.

items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.7 Released
content: This update brings:
• Added support for Phasmophobia v0.13
• Custom Ouija Board Message is currently disabled.

items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.6 Released
content: Fixed an issue where the menu would not load despite it saying it was loaded.

items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.5 Released
content: Updated to work with Phasmophobia v0.12.1.0

items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.4 Released
content: This update brings:
• Small menu redesign.
• Ability to send a custom ouija board message (HOST ONLY).

items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.3 Released
content: This update brings:
• IMPORTANT! The categories have been reworked which means most of your saved settings from the old version won't load.
• ESP issue where it would draw text randomly on your screen sometimes.
• Disturbed salt showing up as Voodoo Doll when using cursed item ESP.
• Pickup. A new ffeature that allows you to pickup any interactable object (Must be turned on before the start of a game).

items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.2 Released
content: This update brings:
• Ghost activity monitor
• Customising the ghost activity (how active the ghost is)
• Noclip no longer moves when the menu is open or if the window is not in focus.
• It's less likely to crash after a game update.

items.title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.1 Released
content: We're excited to announce the release of Asthmaphobia v2.4.1! This update brings compatibility with the latest Phasmophobia version and includes several improvements:
• Updated for Phasmophobia v0.12.0.2
Download the latest version from our website to enjoy all these new features!
